TEXT.TITLE: SUMMAGRAPHICS CONTENDS PATENT SUIT INVALID
TEXT.BODY: <Summagraphics Corp> said the patent infringement suit filed by Lockheed Corp's <LK> Sanders Rogers Associates unit is invalid. Summagraphics said it will seek an injunction to stop Sanders from continuing with its suit. The company said prior to Sanders filing a patent for an electromagnetic digitizing apparatus, it was working with technology that was patented and subsequently reflected in the Rogers patent. Reuter
